plugins.name: ai-rubric
plugins.description: Adds skills to validate gamedev AI systems against a principled rubric covering enemy behaviors, NPC logic, behavior trees, dynamic difficulty, and more

plugins.name: player-protection
plugins.description: Adds skills for designing game mechanics that align player incentives with intended gameplay

plugins.name: ethical-engagement-design
plugins.description: Adds skills for designing player engagement through quality craft — pacing, novelty, goal structure, flow state, and dark pattern avoidance

plugins.name: game-design-problem-solving
plugins.description: Adds skills for diagnosing and fixing game design problems — root cause analysis, lever management, creative reframing, and playtesting methodology

plugins.name: combat-design
plugins.description: Adds skills for designing melee combat systems that feel satisfying — attack animation phases, hit stop, game feel, defensive mechanics, style scoring, and enemy telegraphs

plugins.name: puzzle-design
plugins.description: Adds skills for designing puzzles that make players feel smart — catch and revelation structure, misdirection, minimalism, difficulty curves, and playtesting methodology

plugins.name: gamedev-mentor
plugins.description: Adds skills for reviewing game codebases and consulting with developers — surfaces design problems across AI, combat, player incentives, engagement, and puzzle domains
